scripts.build: npm run build -w tui && npm run build -w ai && npm run build -w agent && npm run build -w coding-agent && npm run build -w mom && npm run build -w web-ui && npm run build -w pods
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ai,agent,coding-agent,mom,web-ui,tui" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,red,white,green,magenta" "npm run dev -w ai" "npm run dev -w agent" "npm run dev -w coding-agent" "npm run dev -w mom" "npm run dev -w web-ui" "npm run dev -w tui"
scripts.dev:tsc: concurrently --names "ai,web-ui" --prefix-colors "cyan,green" "npm run dev:tsc -w ai" "npm run dev:tsc -w web-ui"
scripts.check: biome check --write . && tsgo --noEmit && npm run check -w web-ui
